question: Provide PMIDs supporting that BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 A397P confers resistance to Imatinib Mesylate.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 A397P'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
